title: Popular
text:
EnglishVietnameseGiven a directed graph G, N vertices and M edges.A node X called "accessible" to Y if there is a path from X to YA node X called "popular" if every node Y in V fulfil at least one of two conditions:X is accessible to YY is accessible to XThe Problem: Given graph G, count the number of popular nodes.Input- The first line contain N and M, the number of nodes and edges (1 ≤ N ≤ 150000; 1 ≤ M ≤ 300000)- M next lines, each line contains x and y, there is an edge from x to y.Output- First line print number of popular nodes.- Second line print popular nodes in increasing order.ExampleInput:5 4
1 2
3 2
2 4
4 5Output:3
2 4 5
